name: cp-news-item
description: A news list item component with date, category tag, title, and external link

arguments.name: date
arguments.description: The publication date of the news item

arguments.name: category
arguments.description: The category/tag for the news item

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: The title/headline of the news item

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: The URL the news item links to

arguments.name: isExternal
arguments.description: Whether the link opens in a new window/tab
